title: Brace yourselves everybody.....
body: A double-up of acension madness is coming 😴👏🏻

replies.body: I don't get why people don't like ascension. In my opinion it's probably just as fun or even more fun than URF (and definitely more fun than that AR-URF crap).
Is it just me or have the boards been updated?

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=sLbuNBPA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-08T06:00:53.062+0000)
>
> Is it just me or have the boards been updated?

The boards themselves are no different, the change is in the "header" of the website.
The only consilation I guess which I've just thought about is that it's a pretty good map to test the assasin reworks on.
